title: Unable to receive help from Riot Support
body:
I've had my Season Rewards taken away from me, and as these rewards included a Challenger boarder which I spent a good million years working towards, you can imagine why I'd be a little sad when it gets taken away from me. I tried to contact Riot Support, after 2 days I got a generic 'copy-paste' message which didn't even address my problem. I waited another 2 days for them to tell me that my request has been transfered over to the 'Player Behaviour' department. It's been over 7 days and still no response, I even bumped my request to make sure it hadn't been burried somehow.

Not really sure what to do since Riot Support doesn't seem to be helping at all.

replies.body:
Your season rewards were removed due to elo-boosting during the 2014 season, which I have taken the time to confirm. Playing ranked games on an account that doesn't belong to you, or having someone else played ranked games on your account, falls under elo-boosting.

Your ticket is sitting with the Player Behaviour team and will be answered, but they are experiencing a massive spike in ticket volume due to the amount of inquiries similar to yours so expected wait times are much longer than usual.

>I spent a good million years working towards

But seasons end before a year can pass?
why did you get your season rewards taken from you ?
That is exactly what I'm trying to find out
